content:
IDataBoundItemControl Interface

Definition

Exposes the properties that are used to display a single item in a data-bound control.

In this Article

public interface IDataBoundItemControl : System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl

Remarks

This interface provides properties that are used to display a single item in the FormView and DetailsView data-bound controls.

Properties

DataKey

Gets the object that represents the data-key value of the row in a data-bound control.

public System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey DataKey { get; }
Value
DataKey

The object that represents the data-key value of the row in the data-bound control.

Mode

Gets the current mode of a data-bound control.

public System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode Mode { get; }
Value
DataBoundControlMode

The current mode of the data-bound control.

Remarks

The possible modes are ReadOnly, Edit and Insert.
